BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO actia_audit_parafinal_trn a (a.gnum_hospital_code, a.num_audit_parafinal_slno,a.str_audit_start_year, a.str_audit_end_year,a.str_audit_body_code,a.DT_SUBMISSION_MSO_DATE,a.DT_SUBMISSION_GOV_DATE, a.num_dept_code, a.str_conc_person_name,a.str_action_tobe_taken, a.gstr_remarks,a.dt_final_rep_sub_date, a.gnum_isvalid, a.gnum_seat_id,a.gdt_entry_date, a.gdt_lstmod_date, a.gnum_lstmod_seatid,a.str_status,a.STR_SENT_TO_MSO,a.STR_SENT_TO_GOV) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update actia_audit_paratrack_trn t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_PARATRACK_SLNO=?
update actia_audit_track_trn t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_REPLY_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_REP_SLNO=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_PROPOSED_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_PROPOSED_SLNO=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_BODY_SCH_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.num_audit_sch_slno=?

update ACTIA_AUDIT_PARAFINAL_TRN A set A.STR_AUDIT_START_YEAR=?,A.STR_AUDIT_END_YEAR=?,A.STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE=?,A.DT_SUBMISSION_MSO_DATE=?,A.DT_SUBMISSION_GOV_DATE=?,A.NUM_DEPT_CODE=?,A.STR_CONC_PERSON_NAME=?,A.STR_ACTION_TOBE_TAKEN=?,A.GSTR_REMARKS=?,A.DT_FINAL_REP_SUB_DATE=?,A.GNUM_ISVALID=?,A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,A.STR_SENT_TO_MSO = ?,A.STR_SENT_TO_GOV = ? where A.NUM_AUDIT_PARAFINAL_SLNO=? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE actia_audit_parafinal_trn T SET T.STR_AUDIT_START_YEAR=?,T.STR_AUDIT_END_YEAR=?,T.STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE=?,T.DT_SUBMISSION_MSO_DATE=?,T.DT_SUBMISSION_GOV_DATE=?,T.NUM_DEPT_CODE=?,T.STR_CONC_PERSON_NAME=?,T.STR_ACTION_TOBE_TAKEN=?,T.GSTR_REMARKS=?,T.STR_ACTION_STATUS=?,T.DT_FINAL_REP_SUB_DATE=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_PARAFINAL_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
